adrFormatAddress: 249 Church St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I just had my first appointment. I was a little disappointed when I walked in and  the place looked a little make-shift with thin wall partitions, but maybe this where they save on costs. I was a little worried what I was walking into, but when I met the staff they were extremely nice, gentle and knowledgeable. And that’s what is the most important to me — and the unlimited cleanings to keep my teeth healthy! I’ll see how my next deep cleaning treatment goes to give a real opinion. But I would recommend it for the value.

originalText.text: First visit to Wally Health this morning and I am absolutely blown away. I have been going to a very reputable and highly regarded dentist on the Upper East Side of Manhattan for as long as I can remember and was frankly resistant to the idea of the Wally Membership. I did not think it could be effective for the price. Well, I am here to share that I could not get over the efficiency and quality of the experience. The thoroughness of the exam, from the x-rays, to the discussion with the dentist to the cleaning with the hygienist was excellent. Everything they did step by step was demonstrated and explained clearly and concisely. It was a first rate experience across the board. I can’t wait  for my next appointment!

originalText.text: My first visit to Wally was a positive very experience! They were punctual, efficient and thorough. Amazed by how far dentistry has come given my traditional dentist has much older tools. The doctor was prompt and kind and went over all of the diagnostics except gum health which was interesting (the gum health hadn’t been completed yet). Beyond that, all positive so far. Will update if things change for the worse as I try to schedule a second cleaning. But definitely worth the initial fee in my mind no matter what happens next.

originalText.text: Had my first appointment today with Wally and, so far, they seem to be delivering as promised.  It was a smooth process from check-in through x-rays, scans, and cleaning.  Kayla, Christina, and the Doctor were all great and super friendly.  Will recommend to friends and, most shockingly of all, I might actually be excited to see the dentist again

originalText.text: What a great experience! From the hygienists to the dentists it was a nice experience and fast. I really appreciated how thorough everyone was with my results and every step of my cleaning. I was a tad skeptical the price being so low but it’s so worth it!
